lead_paragraph: President Vladimir Putin and top security officials on Tuesday discussed what extra legal steps may be needed to stamp out doping among Russian athletes, Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said.

headline.print_headline: Russia's Putin Discusses Extra Steps to End Doping in Sport
headline.main: Russia's Putin Discusses Extra Steps to End Doping in Sport

snippet: President Vladimir Putin and top security officials on Tuesday discussed what extra legal steps may be needed to stamp out doping among Russian athletes, Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said....
